channel.title: Shmitchell, Shmargaret on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Shmitchell, Shmargaret on Chege's Blog

item.title: On the Dangers of Stochastic Parrots: Can Language Models Be Too Big? ðŸ¦œ
item.description: The paper is written in a period when NLP practitioners are producing bigger (# of parameters; size of training data) language models (LMs), and pushing the top scores on benchmarks. Environmental Risks Large LMs consume a lot of resources, e.g. training a single BERT base model on GPUs was estimated to use as much energy as a trans-American flight. Marginalized communities are doubly punished. They are least likely to benefit from LMs, e.
